description: Introducing VAPOR from Splash Products- give your coveted iPod Touch the life and protection it needs. Splash it with protection and a blast of color with this innovative case. Finished with a unique flex material (ThermoPlastic Urethane - TPU), the Vapor case allows you to grip your device without worrying about it slipping from your hands, or about it gathering fingerprints or pocket lint. The unique design makes installation and removal convenient, and the reinforced edges provide solid protection from drops. The Vapor case offers superior protection compared to plastic cases, and does not gather fingerprints or dust like silicone cases.Go ahead, Splash your iPod Touch with protection and style!
title: splash VAPOR Flex Case Cover for Apple iPod Touch 5, Clear
